CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT(StageName) = "Closed Won", Amount, IF( TEXT(StageName) = "Contract Received", Amount, IF( TEXT(StageName) = "Waiting on Expenses", Amount, IF( TEXT(StageName) = "Closed - All dealerships on axcessa", Amount, IF( TEXT(StageName) = "Executive Committee Approved", Amount, IF( TEXT(StageName) = "Enrolled", Amount,
0))))))
CustomField.label: Amount Won
